plot: When Beverly Hills socialite, Scarlett Davis, has her assets seized by the government, she embarks on a journey into becoming the biggest unprescribed prescription pill dealer Beverly Hills has ever seen.
plot_en: When Beverly Hills socialite, Scarlett Davis, has her assets seized by the government, she embarks on a journey into becoming the biggest unprescribed prescription pill dealer Beverly Hills has ever seen.
plot_es: When Beverly Hills socialite, Scarlett Davis, has her assets seized by the government, she embarks on a journey into becoming the biggest unprescribed prescription pill dealer Beverly Hills has ever seen.
title: Beverly Pills
